creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his famliy and friends
description: five bottle cruet set; cinquefoil body on scroll and volute feet; gallery around five compartments pierced with foliate scrolls; fluted and gadrooned lip; tall scroll and leaf handle; five cut bottles fitted with silver tops: 3 blind and 2 pierced; fully marked on underside of stand; maker's mark and lion passant on handle; 4 bottle tops unmarked; one with maker's mark and lion passant; .1ab blind bottle; ,2ab blind bottle; .3ab blind bottle; .4ab pierced bottle; .5ab pierced bottle; .6 stand
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

On the side of the stand, within an oval, is engraved an unidentified crest.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of base.  Maker\'s mark and lion passant on handle, on vinegar bottle, and inside on one of the frames.
title: Cruet set, blind bottle
